Detailed Description

This file contains the FUStringBuilderT template class, its defined template classes and its helper classes.

Variable Documentation

FCOLLADA_EXPORT FUStringBuilder globalBuilder
 

Declares a global Unicode string builder.

As many functions within FCollada use the global string builders, their content is often overwritten. Use this builder only for quick conversion or character accumulation.

FCOLLADA_EXPORT FUSStringBuilder globalSBuilder
 

Declares a global 8-bit string builder.

As many functions within FCollada use the global string builders, their content is often overwritten. Use this builder only for quick conversion or character accumulation.
